Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: SeaBass
Reviews.Content: With action cameras, they are always exposed to the elements.  I have been waiting for this waterproof case to become available to protect my EGO camera when I mount it to my truck during off-roading trips.  This case is just what I hoped it would be - strong, easy to use, and seals tight.  I'm a lot more comfortable with my camera mounted to my front bumper now, even during inclement weather.I am giving my review a 1 star deduction for only one reason - at certain angles in the sun, a little bit of glare occurs from the front of this case.  It's not distracting at all, but now that I know it's there it bugs me.  It's only at certain exact angles when facing towards the sun so it's not all the time.  Actually, I get more glare from my windshield than I do from this case, so don't let that affect your decision.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. Had a slight fogging issue but that was due to the very cold morning at the track. Didn't have further issues once it warmed up

Reviews.Title: great case
Reviews.Author: MC
Reviews.Content: great for waterproofing the camera, have found it very useful and would definitely recommend as it really doesnt add too much bulk to the camera, but provides quality protection

Reviews.Title: Waterproof housing doesn't fit in chest harness
Reviews.Author: The Mcneills
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I haven't been able to test the housing. It looks like it would work great. However, I bought it with the chest harness, and didn't find out until it was too late, that the waterproof housing is too big to fit into the chest harness. Bottom Line: no rafting videos! :-(

Reviews.Title: Works great under water
Reviews.Author: Bored Squid
Reviews.Content: My friend has one.  We are military, stationed on a tiny island called Diego Garcia.  We snorkel frequently among the many reefs and recently, his parents sent him both the camera and the water proof case.  they've both held up well.  we usually snorkel at LEAST 4 times a week and so far, not one problem with it.  mine is in my queue waiting to ship right now.

Reviews.Title: Nice case
Reviews.Author: charles d jones
Reviews.Content: This is a nice case and seals well. Have not yet tested in wet.The case locks well and the spring buttons help change settings.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Water proof housing is good for Water Sports such as Kayaking, Surfing, Wake boarding
Easy to use latch lock
Clear So the color of the Ego Shows through
Xtreme Sport Cams Optics Accessories Underwater Camera Housing
The Ego Model#727 is not included with the waterproof housing it is old separately
ProductInfo.Name: Liquid Image 750 Ego Series Mountable Camera Waterproof Case (Clear)
